bug.author: brollb
bug.summary: Execution fails: Cannot read property 'push' of undefined
bug.description: When changing the inputs/outputs defined for an operation that has a connection in a pipeline, the connection should be deleted. This error results from the connection remaining and becoming a 'dangling' connection <denchmark-code>logger.js:66 TypeError: Cannot read property 'push' of undefined(â€¦)r.error @ logger.js:66startPromise.then.then.fail.e @ ExecutePipeline.js:119r @ q.js:844(anonymous function) @ q.js:870when @ q.js:1122i.promiseDispatch @ q.js:788(anonymous function) @ q.js:604e @ q.js:137t @ q.js:125 </denchmark-code>
